name: 排隊理論
description:
This course provides fundamentals for system modeling and analysis regarding OS, network, OR, etc. Topics include simple markovian birth-death queuing models, advanced markovian queuing models,  network queues, and models with general arrival or service pattern

本課程介紹並分析操作系統，網路系統等之基礎系統模型，主題包括:
•	simple markovian birth-death queuing models，
•	advanced markovian queuing models
•	network queues
•	models with general arrival or service pattern
goals: To be capable of modeling stochastic systems and analysis
To obtain sufficient knowledge for performing reliable network simulations and obtaining pertinent performance metrics.
syllabus:
1\. Introduction (12 hours)  
2\. Simple Markovian birth-death queueing models (15 hours)  
3\. Advanced Markovian queueing models (15 hours)  
4\. Networks, series, and cyclic queues (9 hours)  
5\. Models with general arrival or service patterns (3 hours)
